title: Lol only 3 adcs are viable

replies.body:
{{champion:21}} 53.7% win rate 10% pick rate
oh boi, not viable
https://i.gyazo.com/954c7fba372d0e634c66dac728701966.png
really  unplayable

its the same shit as season 7 when they spammed that adc2k17 meme.

they could not stop crying because ziggs was viable with a 50.2% winrate. you had people complaining daily, that "you dont even need adc anymore". XD

the entire game revolved around turret first blood and repeatedly 5 manning bot lane within the first 5 minutes for it, because it signlehandedly decided games, but they wanted their champions items buffed, because ziggs was their biggest concern.

Bot-lane ADC is in bit of a state. People should consider the other option, APC -ability power carry. 

Put Heimerdinger down bot-lane, ignore your ADC after it get crushed back to next week and take over the lane and show them what you got. And Yasuo can go mid

That's only reason champs like Yasuo work out going bot-lane anyways, there is almost ALWAYS a champ support that can be APC down there, something like Yasuo is just there to kill stuff and flex his EPen
